log.content: I would like you to create an svg image of a sunset through the mountains. Make sure the result is visible in index.html

function.arguments:
{"filename":"sunset.svg","content":"<svg width="400" height="350">

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"filename":"index.html","content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Sunset Through Mountains</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Embedding the SVG file here -->
    <object type="image/svg+xml" data="sunset.svg"></object>
</body>
</html>"}

log.content:
I have created an SVG image of a sunset through the mountains and included it in your `index.html` file. You can now view this image by opening the `index.html` file in your web browser.

The SVG image represents a simple scene with a colorful sky above some small mountain ranges. The HTML file embeds this SVG to make it visible when you open the page.

If you need any modifications or further enhancements, please let me know!
